data.trans_hint: Nếu bạn nằm đổi chiều thì bạn sẽ thấy dễ ngủ hơn.
data.en_hint: If you turn over you will find it easier to get to sleep.
data.content_game_1: If you turn over you will find it easier to get to sleep.
data.answer_en_hint: If you turn over you will find it easier to get to sleep.

data.trans_hint: Vợ anh ta đã khiến anh ta trở thành một người đàn ông tốt hơn sau khi kết hôn.
data.en_hint: His wife turned him into a better man after marriage.
data.content_game_1: His wife turned him into a better man after marriage.
data.answer_en_hint: His wife turned him into a better man after marriage.

data.trans: Biến cái gì thành cái gì
data.trans_hint: Tôi đã biến thất bại thành thành động lực để tiếp tục làm việc tốt hơn.
data.en_hint: I turned my failure into my motivation to keep up my better work.
data.content_game_1: I turned my failure into my motivation to keep up my better work.
data.answer_en_hint: I turned my failure into my motivation to keep up my better work.

data.trans: Quay lưng lại (với ai hay điều gì)
data.trans_hint: Họ quay lưng lại với ý tưởng của tôi vì nó được cho là không khả thi.
data.en_hint: They turned themselves against my idea as it was told not to have been possible.
data.content_game_1: They turned themselves against my idea as it was told not to have been possible.
data.answer_en_hint: They turned themselves against my idea as it was told not to have been possible.

data.trans: Khiến cuộc sống của ai bị đảo lộn
data.trans_hint: Thất bại trong các vụ đầu tư đã khiến cho cuộc sống cô ta bị đảo lộn.
data.en_hint: Her failure in investments has turned her world upside down.
data.content_game_1: Her failure in investments has turned her world upside down.
data.answer_en_hint: Her failure in investments has turned her world upside down.

data.trans_hint: Tôi gấp cái áo này nhỏ lại để nhét vừa vào va li.
data.en_hint: I turned this shirt up to fit in my suitcase.
data.content_game_1: I turned this shirt up to fit in my suitcase.
data.answer_en_hint: I turned this shirt up to fit in my suitcase.

data.trans_hint: Ước gì tôi có thể quay ngược lại thời gian để sửa chữa những sai lầm mà tôi đã gây ra cho cô ấy.
data.en_hint: I wish I could turn the clock back to fix my mistakes I did to her.
data.content_game_1: I wish I could turn the clock back to fix my mistakes I did to her.
data.answer_en_hint: I wish I could turn the clock back to fix my mistakes I did to her.
